00030 #ifndef __ShadowTextureManager_H__
00031 #define __ShadowTextureManager_H__
00032 
00033 // Precompiler options
00034 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00035 #include "OgreSingleton.h"
00036 #include "OgrePixelFormat.h"
00037 #include "OgreTexture.h"
00038 #include "OgreIteratorWrappers.h"

00041 namespace Ogre
00042 {
00049     typedef vector<TexturePtr>::type ShadowTextureList;
00050 
00052     struct ShadowTextureConfig
00053     {
00054         unsigned int width;
00055         unsigned int height;
00056         PixelFormat format;
00057         unsigned int fsaa;
00058         uint16      depthBufferPoolId;
00059 
00060         ShadowTextureConfig()
00061             : width(512), height(512), format(PF_X8R8G8B8), fsaa(0), depthBufferPoolId(1) {}
00062     };
00063 
00064     typedef vector<ShadowTextureConfig>::type ShadowTextureConfigList;
00065     typedef ConstVectorIterator<ShadowTextureConfigList> ConstShadowTextureConfigIterator;
00066 
00067     inline _OgreExport bool operator== ( const ShadowTextureConfig& lhs, const ShadowTextureConfig& rhs );
00068     inline _OgreExport bool operator!= ( const ShadowTextureConfig& lhs, const ShadowTextureConfig& rhs );
00069 
00070 
00081     class _OgreExport ShadowTextureManager : public Singleton<ShadowTextureManager>, public ShadowDataAlloc
00082     {
00083     protected:
00084         ShadowTextureList mTextureList;
00085         ShadowTextureList mNullTextureList;
00086         size_t mCount;
00087 
00088     public:
00089         ShadowTextureManager();
00090         virtual ~ShadowTextureManager();
00091 
00095         virtual void getShadowTextures(const ShadowTextureConfigList& config, 
00096             ShadowTextureList& listToPopulate);
00097 
00101         virtual TexturePtr getNullShadowTexture(PixelFormat format);
00102 
00108         virtual void clearUnused();
00113         virtual void clear();
00114 
00130         static ShadowTextureManager& getSingleton(void);
00146         static ShadowTextureManager* getSingletonPtr(void);
00147 
00148     };
00149 
00152 }
